author: Adam White, Adam White
title: Coronavirus: Danny DeVito urges young people to stay indoors or 'old people' like him might die
description: Robert De Niro also referenced one of his classic movie lines in his own coronavirus message
content:
Danny DeVito has called on young people to stay indoors during the coronavirus pandemic, or old people like him might die.
The beloved actor recorded a video from inside his home for New York governor Andrew Cuomo, who published it on his social media channe… [+984 chars]
